article.title: Lockheed Receives Space Based Infrared System Contract Modification
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Space Systems Co., Sunnyvale, Calif., is being awarded a $12,972,373 contract modification for Space Based Infrared System high component. The Air Force Space and Missile Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif., is the contracting activity.
